title: Dragon Gold
description: Harri would love to know what it feels like to win. Just once. Ryan always wins everything because of his ultra-competitive dad. Harri has no chance. Until someone walks into his mum's shop. Someone almost invisible.What would you do if your school held a competition to make a dragon - and you had a dragon? A real, fire-breathing, very unpredictable dragon?But you can't tell anyone.
author: Shoo Rayner
